data.text: @GabrielSteel6 @lyndseyfifield @LarryOConnor In some cases yes but more and more seem to believe the nonsense they spew - especially the likes of Acosta, Cillizza who have given up any pretense of objectivity.
@MitchWex @lyndseyfifield @LarryOConnor well since they themselves have become targets for scrutiny - the majority opt to stay out of the bulls eye by asking safe stuff

@lyndseyfifield @LarryOConnor Trump is a corrupt degenerate that Republicans allowed to hold the highest office in our country without any meaningful oversight Lyndsey. If you want media and democrats to be rational, you guys could pitch in once in a while.

@GabrielSteel6 @lyndseyfifield @LarryOConnor I can count on one hand the number of journalists at left wing media outlets who have bothered to push back (and look what happens to them) which ensures a group think that ignores reality and puts a partisan filter on everything

@GabrielSteel6 @lyndseyfifield @LarryOConnor Like when you are releasing a book about Fox at the same time, behind the scenes at your own network, two top execs are romantically involved, one is coordinating with the ny gov on questions he will get from his own brother on their network, and he skips it all.

@GabrielSteel6 @lyndseyfifield @LarryOConnor Here’s the thing - he did originally have a unique angle, and media reporting has grown in importance, but he has chosen to go for the lowest hanging fruit of being hyper partisan and thus nullified anything he may have had going for him.
@GabrielSteel6 @lyndseyfifield @LarryOConnor The standard response when left wing media are criticized is to say ‘but Fox’ while ignoring that I feel the same about Fox.

@MitchWex @lyndseyfifield @LarryOConnor the man is a meathead propped into a position of incompetence - no intellectual depth - the class of professionalism in journalism has degraded - and some maybe because their financial model is click driven now

@MitchWex @lyndseyfifield @LarryOConnor no self awareness - even the influencers on social media   same thing.  they have so much crap on themselves from throwing crap at others. maybe a return to the fairness doctrine will begin to pull the plane out of it's nose dive

@GabrielSteel6 @lyndseyfifield @LarryOConnor Funny we both called him out at once.  I hesitate to give him more credit than he deserves, but I also can very easily point lines from him and those who believe ‘reliable sources’ to the current state of polarized, less informed commentary
